titles.title: You are the Rose of Sharon, oh ...

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are the Rose of Sharon, oh ...
Yes, You are the Rose of Sharon, oh ...
Yes, You are the Rose of Sharon,
And I love You so, I love You so,
I love You so, I love You so.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You are the Lily of the Valley ...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You are the King of Kings ...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: You are the fairest of ten thousand ...
